# Monsters and Mixtures

Learning how to deal with:

* Over-dispersed counts
* Beta-Binomial model
* Negative-binomial or gamma-Poisson
* Zero-inflated outcomes
* Ordered categorical outcomes
* Ordered categorical predictors
